===============

The Official Careers Website of the City of New York

[Shortlist 0](javascript:void(0);)

[Explore nyc.gov](https://www.nyc.gov/)

 Jobs  

Keyword 

Search

NYC is hiring
=============

There are three ways to get a job with the city:

*   Find a job online
*   Attend a recruitment event
*   Take a civil service exam

 Jobs  

Keyword 

Search

[View all jobs](https://cityjobs.nyc.gov/jobs)

![Image 2:  Synchronized swim class at a NYC Parks & Recreation pool. Instructor's shirt reads "Aquatic Specialist, City of New York, Parks & Recreation."](https://attraxcdnprod1-freshed3dgayb7c3.z01.azurefd.net/1481180/a59795fb-f407-4112-8df0-3cd97b229d1b/2025.7.21.15500/img/e819a7bf-b201-4766-548b-08dc21fbe72a)

![Image 3](https://attraxcdnprod1-freshed3dgayb7c3.z01.azurefd.net/1481180/a59795fb-f407-4112-8df0-3cd97b229d1b/2025.7.21.15500/img/e819a7bf-b201-4766-548b-08dc21fbe72a)
Need help finding work?
-----------------------

Get free career training and help finding a job in government or the private sector.

See your options:

 View programs 

[Sign up for job programs newsletter](https://jobready.nyc.gov/newsletter/)

[Shortlist 0](javascript:void(0);)

Work for a better NYC
---------------------

Get the unmatched stability of a government career and make a real difference in your community. As a City employee, you’ll get the chance to make a positive impact on New Yorkers’ lives every day you go to work.

![Image 4:  City employees at a hiring event helping attendees apply for jobs](https://attraxcdnprod1-freshed3dgayb7c3.z01.azurefd.net/1481180/a59795fb-f407-4112-8df0-3cd97b229d1b/2025.7.21.15500/img/832ea101-8881-48e5-a2ab-08db7193d251)

Recruitment events
------------------

Discover opportunities and learn about civil service. At some events, you can come with a resume and leave with a job.

Thursday July 31

NYC Children Cook Hiring Event

NYC Administration for Children's Services

9:00AM-3:00PM

[](https://forms.office.com/g/ABMM9YR9eX)

Friday August 15

NYC Children Nurses Hiring Event

NYC Administration for Children's Services

9:00AM-3:00PM

[](https://forms.office.com/g/A6w0vbrhiC)

Civil service exams
-------------------

Some City jobs may require you to take an exam, either before or after getting hired. Signing up for an upcoming exam is a great way to land a new job in your field.

[About civil service exams](https://www.nyc.gov/site/dcas/employment/apply-for-a-city-job.page)

![Image 5: Group of people sitting in the audience at an information session](https://attraxcdnprod1-freshed3dgayb7c3.z01.azurefd.net/1481180/a59795fb-f407-4112-8df0-3cd97b229d1b/2025.7.21.15500/img/a9c5ed8e-aac9-46b0-901a-08db7262c280)

Explore careers
---------------

See all open jobs at a specific agency:

 View agency jobs 

Or choose a category to see open positions:

AmeriCorps Service Year
-----------------------

NYC Service is recruiting 150 New Yorkers, 18 and older, to serve in AmeriCorps starting in September 2024 through June 2025. Gain transferrable skills and practical experience, receive 200+ hours of professional development, and an education award.

[View all positions](https://www.nycservice.org/national_service)

![Image 20: Photo of women working at a computer with a clipboard and wearing an AmeriCorps t-shirt.](https://attraxcdnprod1-freshed3dgayb7c3.z01.azurefd.net/1481180/a59795fb-f407-4112-8df0-3cd97b229d1b/2025.7.21.15500/img/29f2ea34-2fda-4743-f7f3-08dc8700fcc7)

Internships and fellowships
---------------------------

There are hundreds of opportunities in NYC government for high school students, college students, and recent graduates.

[Find internships and fellowships](https://www.nyc.gov/site/dcas/employment/internship-and-fellowships.page)

![Image 21:  Job fair attendee listening intently](https://attraxcdnprod1-freshed3dgayb7c3.z01.azurefd.net/1481180/a59795fb-f407-4112-8df0-3cd97b229d1b/2025.7.21.15500/img/71ab5559-5f57-4752-901b-08db7262c280)
